thread.title: Premier League Player of the Month: Who was the most recent winner at your club?
thread.title_full: Premier League Player of the Month: Who was the most recent winner at your club?

title: Premier League Player of the Month: Who was the most recent winner at your club?
text:
1 of 37 Which player last won a Premier League Player of the Month award at your club? 
Three current Premier League clubs have never had a Player of the Month winner among their ranks, but there are plenty of former top-flight sides who can boast that achievement. 
While the well-established clubs have dominated the Player and Manager of the Month awards since their inception, it's been nearly two years since an Arsenal player won the accolade and nearly three since a Liverpool player was victorious 
Can you remember which player last picked up the award for your team? 
Scroll through the gallery above to find out who was the most recent Player of the Month winner at your club. Related articles
